#summary The CPI Online as an example of Gap Data
#labels Featured

 The CPI Online [http://code.google.com/p/cpi/source/browse/trunk/server server] is a [http://gap-data.googlecode.com/ Gap Data] application.

 The Gap Data compiler generates java programming language source code for Google App Engine data beans.  The Gap Data Bean is defined in ODL.  

 The CPI Online defines one GD/ODL application bean, [http://code.google.com/p/cpi/source/browse/trunk/server/odl/oso/data/Person.odl Person].  Gap Data employs this class for any logged- in user, so the CPI Online simply extends the definition of the named location of this class.
{{{
package oso.data;
path /people;
import cpi.Inventory;

class Person version 5 {
    *unique String logonId;
    List.Primitive<Inventory> inventory;
    Float nf;
    Float nt;
    Float st;
    Float sf;
    Date created;
    Date completed;
}
}}}
